page.title: 05TRANSPORT AND COMMUNICATION
page.content:
{Transport { There is a wide variety of transport found in this area. Along the main road, just off the A32, we made a survey of the forms of transport using the road over a five minute period.
{ LORRIES:} 18{ CARS/VANS:}70 { BUSES/COACHES:}7 {MOTORBIKES:}9 { TRACTORS:} 2 {BICYCLES: }1
{Communication {} The only real communication in this area is the telephone.There are about ten public telephone boxes,but they are not really used often.However , there is a quite regular postal service every two days,and there are about five post boxes.
